EmailTemplate.name: 201810_Americas_Webinar_ThankYou_mih.201810_Americas_Webinar_ThankYou_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending the Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thank you for joining my recent webinar, Making Sense of UAV Inspections for Energy <[[https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1206398&tp_key=e6fc750c50&sti=honeywell]]>, about how Honeywell is collaborating with utility companies to improve safety and efficiency through UAV inspections.
Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/EPL_UAV Inspections_Takeaway.pdf]]> to see the pdf of my presentation – I hope it helps you understand the advantages, risks and associated costs of UAV inspections, as well as the value that these inspections and data analytics can provide.
If you are interested in learning more about Honeywell’s UAV inspection capabilities, please feel free to call me or drop me a note via email. I love talking drones and I’m an open book! You can also connect with me on LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/royallyawesome/]]>, too.
Cheers!
Jill Brown Senior Technical Manager Commercial UAV Solutions Honeywell | Aerospace Mobile: 602.434.3164 Find me on LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/royallyawesome/ <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/royallyawesome/]]> jill.brown@honeywell.com <[[mailto:jill.brown@honeywell.com]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
